When holding BTC you are using it. You are using its economic properties as an uncorrelated, high growth, safe haven asset.   The majority of gold gets extracted from the ground, shaped into bars, all to be locked up into vaults. A kid would say "Dad, why aren't they using it?"

Money needs encryption to protect its supply from excess production.  Gold is encrypted by chemistry and physics, but lacks portability.  Fiat currency is encrypted by coercion and violence, but lacks scarcity.  #Bitcoin is encrypted by mathematics and thermodynamics, perfectly.
